name: NOS Alive - 11, 12 & 13 JUL
description: Passeio Martimo de Algés. O melhor cartaz sempre! Age restriction: Children under 6 are not admitted

name: Forever King of Pop
description: "The best show about Michael Jackson!" - Joseph Jackson, Michael Jackson's father.

name: The World of Hans Zimmer - Symphonic Celebration
description: One of the most acclaimed composers of recent years. The orchestra of Hans Zimmer, world renowned for the role he plays in contemporary movie soundtracks, will perform at the Altice Arena.

name: Fado in Chiado
description: Fado is Portuguese and was born in Lisbon. The emotion of the voice, accompanied by the classical guitar and Portuguese guitar, so charmed UNESCO that it declared the Fado to be Intangible Cultural Heritage of Humanity.

name: Voa 2019 - Heavy Rock Festival
description: After the confirmations of SLIPKNOT and SLAYER, which will on 4th and 5th of July, respectively, lead the tenth edition of VOA - HEAVY ROCK FESTIVAL, and also the long awaited LAMB OF GOD, we have the pleasure to announce four more names in an event that it is meant to be memorable.

name: Museu Coleção Berardo
description: The Museu Coleção Berardo presents the most significant artistic movements from the twentieth century to the present day, establishing its position as the main museum for modern and contemporary art in Portugal.
